text: Jwalakwe jwatite: “Nganiiŵa im’bichilile ŵanganyammwe yakulya kuŵa lisiki lyenu, ikaŵeje chimbe ndili nantagulile ngopolelo syakwe nkaniim’bichilile. Ayi niyine mu yanjiganyisye Ambuje ŵangu (Allah). Chisimu une nesile dini jaŵandu ŵangakukulupilila mwa Allah, soni ŵanganyao ya Akhera akuŵa ali nkuikana.”
